title: MCP tools/call result (CallToolResult) v1
description: Canonical shape for skill tool results so MCP clients (e.g. Cursor) never see result: null or invalid_union. Used by @skill_command normalization and agent handler.

content.description: List of content items (MCP Content type). At least one item with type 'text' for display.

isError.description: True when the tool returned an error (e.g. ExecutionResult.success=false).
